job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Power up our site infrastructure to keep pace with the company's explosive growth and cutting-edge advancements!
     * Set the standard for observability best practices across our entire tech stack, making sure nothing escapes our keen eyes.
     * Take the helm and pioneer the creation of a fully automated, developer self-service platform, unleashing lightning-fast execution and seamless continuous delivery.
     * Blaze a trail by researching, developing, and implementing top-notch infrastructure management standards for our cloud accounts (AWS and GCP).
     * Collaborate with our AI team to construct an infrastructure that ignites rapid, high-scale deep learning exploration, development, and deployment.
     * Stand tall as the champion of our DevOps culture, empowering our product teams to conquer tasks at warp speed with utmost safety.
     * Dive into the on-call rotation, fearlessly debugging and resolving issues that dare to impede our progress.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about How Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Cloud Platform Engineer

* Power up our site infrastructure to keep pace with the company's explosive growth and cutting-edge advancements!
     * Set the standard for observability best practices across our entire tech stack, making sure nothing escapes our keen eyes.
     * Take the helm and pioneer the creation of a fully automated, developer self-service platform, unleashing lightning-fast execution and seamless continuous delivery.
     * Blaze a trail by researching, developing, and implementing top-notch infrastructure management standards for our cloud accounts (AWS and GCP).
     * Collaborate with our AI team to construct an infrastructure that ignites rapid, high-scale deep learning exploration, development, and deployment.
     * Stand tall as the champion of our DevOps culture, empowering our product teams to conquer tasks at warp speed with utmost safety.
     * Dive into the on-call rotation, fearlessly debugging and resolving issues that dare to impede our progress.

   And to have a glimpse of some of the amazing stuff we do on the tech side, here is a fresh piece by An Tran, our Head of Engineering about How Creative Fabrica is supporting creators with Generative AI.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on cloud infrastructure, DevOps, and supporting AI teams, rather than directly building or deploying AI models. While it mentions collaborating with an AI team, the core responsibilities are infrastructure-centric, aligning more with a Cloud Platform Engineer role than a specialized AI role.

job_tasks.phrase: Power up our site infrastructure to keep pace with the company's explosive growth and cutting-edge advancements!
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies building and maintaining the underlying infrastructure that supports applications and services, which is a component of software development in a broader sense, especially for platform engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Set the standard for observability best practices across our entire tech stack, making sure nothing escapes our keen eyes.
job_tasks.justification: Observability is a key aspect of monitoring and maintaining systems in production, which falls under operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Take the helm and pioneer the creation of a fully automated, developer self-service platform, unleashing lightning-fast execution and seamless continuous delivery.
job_tasks.justification: Creating automated platforms for developer self-service and continuous delivery is a core tenet of MLOps and DevOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Blaze a trail by researching, developing, and implementing top-notch infrastructure management standards for our cloud accounts (AWS and GCP).
job_tasks.justification: Researching, developing, and implementing infrastructure management standards involves software development principles applied to infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with our AI team to construct an infrastructure that ignites rapid, high-scale deep learning exploration, development, and deployment.
job_tasks.justification: Constructing infrastructure to support AI development and deployment involves software development skills applied to the infrastructure layer.

job_tasks.phrase: Stand tall as the champion of our DevOps culture, empowering our product teams to conquer tasks at warp speed with utmost safety.
job_tasks.justification: Championing DevOps culture and enabling product teams aligns directly with the principles of operations engineering and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Dive into the on-call rotation, fearlessly debugging and resolving issues that dare to impede our progress.
job_tasks.justification: On-call rotations and debugging production issues are fundamental responsibilities within operations engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Set the standard for observability best practices
Take the helm and pioneer the creation of a fully automated, developer self-service platform
Blaze a trail by researching, developing, and implementing top-notch infrastructure management standards
Stand tall as the champion of our DevOps culture
Dive into the on-call rotation, fearlessly debugging and resolving issues
